content: I’ve been saying this for quite awhile now. Each and every time ANYONE pays attention to these media whores, they get another ‘boost’ to their ratings. When saw media posting that ‘E’ Network was signing a 5 year, $100 million contract for that craptastic show, I knew the end was near! These people are the lowest of the low. For someone’s own mother to ‘shop’ around her daughter’s sex tape, in order to create some sort of income for the family, where does this belong in society? Look what it got us for a president, Commander Combover. Enough said, they can’t disappear fast enough in my opinion.
